alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 29 at 8:59PM MST until March 30 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM MST /3 AM MDT/ TO 5 PM MST /6 PM MDT/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph, with gusts from 55 to 65 mph are expected by later tonight through Thursday afternoon. * WHERE...Southern Apache County, mainly on the north side of the White Mountains. * WHEN...From 2 AM MST to 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains
